Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbonauts!

Want to take the opportunity to say thank you to Squad and this amazing community for making this game a serious challenge, but always entertaining and accessible. The Mod community just keeps on amazing me with the depth that they keep on adding to the game, ISA Map Sat being a great example of this.

Now need to get back to my rockets, aiming to reach Eve!

Thanks for making a great game and have fun!

Tiauguinho

Hi Tiauguinho, welcome to the community

Good luck on your Eve flight, have fun
